author: ptahchiev
msg: Remove my changes, as advised by @hboutemy - we must not use the encoding the user provided when parsing an xml document.

author: philip
msg: Have configure detect not-broken-but-patched httpd and override
the MMN detection in mod_authz_svn.  This allows building against
patched distribution binaries such as Debian.  The Windows build
grepping the header files and set SVN_USE_FORCE_AUTHN.

author: fschumacher
msg: Markup changes and addition of explanation for the examples given in __StringFromFile documentation.
